spells.druid spells prepared:
(CL 4th; conc. +5)

2nd-barkskinD, bull's strength, summon swarm

1st-entangleD (2, DC 12), faerie fire, shillelagh (2)

0 (at will)-create water, know direction, light, stabilize

D Domain spell; Domain Plant

sections.body:
Before Combat The druid casts barkskin on himself.

During Combat The druid casts entangle or summon swarm.

Base Statistic Without barkskin, the druid's statistics are

AC 18, touch 11, flat-footed 17.
sections.name: TACTICS

special_qualities: nature bond (Plant domain), nature sense, orc blood, trackless step, weapon familiarity, wild empathy +4, woodland stride
name: Savage Plant sage
